Ask HN: Where do you look for junior devs?
text:
Hello HN,

I know that it may sound odd given the current industry trend, but for those of you who hired junior devs, where do you usually look for? what did it work the best for you?

Thanks in advance!

title: indiehackers.social is a mastodon instance dedicated to unite Indie Hackers
text:
Come join in our new indie hackers mastodon instance. First 25 people can join with this invite link: https://indiehackers.social/invite/yeSXR7aF

From then on, it is invite only!

Show HN: JobsThere – Recruiting, Simplified
text:
Everything you need to power your recruiting.

Build a optimized careers page that allows candidates to find jobs in your company and submit applications directly for them, track applicants & boost growth of your company.

Currently in beta, limited access. Looking for feedback.

Ask HN: Anyone else's FB Ad Sets turned off by FB for no reason?
text: It's happened twice this week.  All of our ad sets were turned off (activity history says that it's 'Facebook'), and now all of our campaigns are back in the learning phase for the second time in the last week.

Ask HN: Any phpbb styled forums for conversation?
text: I saw a release the other day for a forum that is modeled after old phpbb. The site itself was empty though. Any forums with users like HN that have conversation about misc things? Those old forums had good organization.

Ask HN: Uncommon Web Languages?
text:
Recently I have been a huge fan of

1. Imba (https://imba.io/) 2. Mint Lang (https://mint-lang.com/)

and have been quite impressed.

Are there any other languages like these for the web which takes uncommon approaches and tries to make things faster, easier?

Elm is another which I know about and have played with.
